Key:
Jeez, if I'm going to be thrown into some unusual
situation, why not prepare a situation where I can
stomp on you a bit. Gosh, of all the things...
Well, you stomping on me isn't so unusual...

...Hmph. Whatever. I guess we're going to have to
do these sudden events as they come up.

Well, that seems to be the case. I'm praying that
no more weird events will come my way...

We won't know until it happens. It's pointless to
think about it now. Anyways, just be ready for
anything.
